intro: I'm Jacob Goodwin, a Web Developer experienced in writing single page applications and backend services with languages and tools including Vue, React, Go, Nodejs, Akka, gRPC, and GraphQL. I am also an AWS Certified Developer Associate. Check out my portfolio for a list of projects and technologies I work with!

current.description: Golang GraphQL API with React Typescript Admin Panel

about: A few years ago, I started enjoying online programming courses as a post-work hobby. I have since learned numerous technologies and turned my hobby into a career!

I previously worked as an electronics engineer, most recently for an electromagnetics simulation software company where I used my antenna design and simulation expertise to support and consult several top Silicon Valley companies.
